12 RViz::RViz(QWidget *parent) : _render(new rviz::RenderPanel)

14  QFile gridFile(":/rviz/Grid"), robotFile(":/rviz/Pumpkin"), viewsFile(":/rviz/Views");

20  rviz::YamlConfigReader reader;
21  rviz::Config gridConfig, robotConfig, viewsConfig;
22 
23  reader.readString(gridConfig, QTextStream(&gridFile).readAll());
24  reader.readString(robotConfig, QTextStream(&robotFile).readAll());
25  reader.readString(viewsConfig, QTextStream(&viewsFile).readAll());
26 
27  gridFile.close();
28  robotFile.close();
29  viewsFile.close();
30 
31  //Initialize rviz models
32  _manager = new rviz::VisualizationManager(_render);
33  _render->initialize(_manager->getSceneManager(), _manager);
34  _manager->initialize();
35  _manager->startUpdate();
36 
37  _manager->setFixedFrame("map");
38 
39  //_render->setStatusTip("Hello Pumpkin.");
40  //_render->setToolTip("Hello Pumpkin.");
41 
42  //Create the display objects
43  _grid = _manager->createDisplay("rviz/Grid", "Ground grid", true);
44  _robot = _manager->createDisplay("rviz/RobotModel", "Pumpkin Model", true);
45  ROS_ASSERT(_grid != nullptr && _robot != nullptr);
46 
47  _grid->load(gridConfig);
48  _robot->load(robotConfig);
49 
50  _manager->getViewManager()->load(viewsConfig);
51 
52  _render->setSizePolicy(QSizePolicy::Expanding, QSizePolicy::Expanding);
